recommendations.item_metadata: [{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Classic Rock","Southern Rock"],"description":["Their 2005 eponymous debut ignited a tumult of touring, including the 2006 Vans Warped Tour and spots alongside P.O.D., Throwdown, and Zao. They were listed as one of Alternative Press's Bands You Need To Know for 2007 and named one of Metal Hammer's Hot 100: Metal's Most Important Troops for 2007. Their sophomore release, "II" didn't disappoint, and now "III" surges forward with as much savage twang and fearsome melody to inspire the wrath of any just god. A barrage of crunch and stomp, a tirade of licks and rapid fire snares.",""If Lynyrd Skynyrd had a hair up their butts and were more generally pi**ed off than Slayer, they'd sound a whole lot like Birmingham, Alabama's Maylene And The Sons Of Disaster" --La City Beat"],"title":"Maylene & The Sons Of Disaster,III,Ferret Records,5451258,Pop,Rock,Heavy Metal,Pop\/Rock Music,Rock \/ Hard Rock,Recorded Music - Rock & Pop,Rock & Pop - General\" \/>","brand":"Maylene and the Sons of Disaster","rank":"46,807 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B002767SXM","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/61W2%2BZpoV6L.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(June 23, 2009)","Original Release Date:":"June 23, 2009","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"Ferret Records","ASIN:":"B002767SXM"}}]
